summary: Add new stand alone female follower base of Ms. Marvel a Fire Mage level up with player from level 20
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Ms. Marvel[/b]

Add new "Stand alone" female follower base of Ms. Marvel a Fire Mage level up with player from level 20

Name: Ms. Marvel

Body: -CBBE-

Class: Fire Mage

Level: 20

[b]Location:[/b]

[Winterhold frozen hearth inn]

[b]Required :[/b]
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dawnguard.esm

[b]Recommended : [/b]

The LOOT
http://loot.github.io/

UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by [b]Original - fLokii -- Recent updates - Vamyan[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037

Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO by [b]terzaerian[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019

[b]Small Note :[/b]
Im not going to take any request of changing the appearance. [u]Only[/u] to the error for the file.
for the load order i highly recommended The LOOT on Recomended list
if it still not working or cause your game to crash i suggested to remove the file.

[b]Notification: [/b]
This is a follower mod, NOT a armor mod.
Â For the armor are simple retexture from "Chest of Spandex CBBEv3M by sourandsweet Armor"
and i know that Ms. Marvel are using red waist cloth but i'm sorry, i'm not armor modder so i can't make one.
Thank you for understanding and enjoy the mod.

[b]Installation : [/b]

NMM or copy to data folder

[b]Uninstall : [/b]

Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder

[b]Credit : [/b]

BETHESDA

Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by [b]Caliente[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666

BodySlide 2 and Outfit Studio by [b]Caliente[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015

Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC by Maevan2
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986

KS Hairdos - 400 by [b]Kalilies Shocky and Stealthic Khaos[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58221

Chest of Spandex CBBEv3M by [b]sourandsweet[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20701

[b]Please leave a comment and endorsement
"Thank you for download"[/b][url=http://marvel.com/corporate/terms/][/url][/center]
author: Fachry
